subject: Stroke
Pro Bowl
Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. wide receiver Drew Hill, 54, a two-time Pro Bowler, died at an Atlanta hospital Friday after two massive strokes, his agent said.
snippet: The former N.F.L. wide receiver Drew Hill, 54, a two-time Pro Bowler, died at an Atlanta hospital Friday after two massive strokes, his agent said.
